owner_summaries.key_concerns: Control TB.BAL.001 and FX.COV.001 are not effective, leading to potential misstatements in financial reporting.

residual_risks.description: Entity-level TB balances are not zero, indicating potential misstatements in financial statements.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement additional reconciliation procedures and review processes to ensure TB balances to zero.

residual_risks.description: FX rates coverage does not meet policy requirements, risking non-compliance with financial regulations.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Enhance FX rate validation controls and ensure policy adherence through regular audits.

residual_risks.description: High number of flux analysis exceptions indicates potential operational inefficiencies.
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Investigate root causes of exceptions and improve data accuracy and analysis procedures.
